1825.example_1: rājā mahāvijito imehi aṭṭhah'aṅgehi samannāgato. iti imāni'pi aṭṭh'aṅgāni tass'eva yaññassa parikkhārā bhavanti.
1825.example_2: anujānāmi, bhikkhave, aṭṭhah'aṅgehi samannāgataṃ bhikkhuṃ bhikkhun'ovādakaṃ sammannituṃ.

60759.meaning_1: to authorize; to appoint; to elect; to choose
60759.example_1: anujānāmi, bhikkhave, aṭṭhah'aṅgehi samannāgataṃ bhikkhuṃ bhikkhun'ovādakaṃ sammannituṃ.

21492.meaning_1: wearing a organic brown robe; wearing Buddhist robe
21492.example_1: na kho pan'etaṃ bhagavantaṃ uddissa pabbajitāya kāsāyavatthavasanāya garudhammaṃ ajjhāpannapubbo hoti

24542.meaning_2: important or serious offence; breach of serious rule of observance
24542.example_1: na kho pan'etaṃ bhagavantaṃ uddissa pabbajitāya kāsāyavatthavasanāya garudhammaṃ ajjhāpannapubbo hoti

1337.example_1: na kho pan'etaṃ bhagavantaṃ uddissa pabbajitāya kāsāyavatthavasanāya garudhammaṃ ajjhāpannapubbo hoti

2312.example_1: vīsativasso vā hoti atirekavīsativasso vā, anujānāmi, bhikkhave, imehi aṭṭhah'aṅgehi samannāgataṃ bhikkhuṃ bhikkhun'ovādakaṃ sammannitun'ti.
2312.commentary: (VINa) vīsativasso vā'ti upasampadāya vīsativasso tato atirekavasso vā.

44313.meaning_1: monastery grounds; space around a building
44313.meaning_2: surroundings of a building, surrounding walk
44313.example_1: tena sammatena bhikkhunā pariveṇaṃ sammajjitvā pānīyaṃ paribhojanīyaṃ upaṭṭhāpetvā āsanaṃ paññapetvā dutiyaṃ gahetvā nisīditabbaṃ.

60713.example_1: tena sammatena bhikkhunā pariveṇaṃ sammajjitvā pānīyaṃ paribhojanīyaṃ upaṭṭhāpetvā āsanaṃ paññapetvā dutiyaṃ gahetvā nisīditabbaṃ.
60713.commentary: (VINa) pariveṇaṃ sammajjitvā'ti sace pāto asammaṭṭhaṃ sammaṭṭham'pi vā puna tiṇapaṇṇ'ādīhi uklāpaṃ pādappahārehi ca vikiṇṇavālikaṃ jātaṃ, sammajjitabbaṃ.

15565.meaning_1: having set up; having made sure is present
15565.example_1: na kho, ānanda, sukaraṃ paresaṃ dhammaṃ desetuṃ. paresaṃ, ānanda, dhammaṃ desentena pañca dhamme ajjhattaṃ upaṭṭhāpetvā paresaṃ dhammo desetabbo. katame pañca?
15565.example_2: tena sammatena bhikkhunā pariveṇaṃ sammajjitvā pānīyaṃ paribhojanīyaṃ upaṭṭhāpetvā āsanaṃ paññapetvā dutiyaṃ gahetvā nisīditabbaṃ.

77927.meaning_1: (of the community) all present; all here; all in attendance
77927.example_1: tena bhikkhunā pucchitabbā, samagg'āttha, bhaginiyo'ti? sace samagg'āmh'āyyā'ti bhaṇanti, vattanti, bhaginiyo, aṭṭha garudhammā'ti? sace vattant'āyyā'ti bhaṇanti, eso, bhaginiyo, ovādo'ti niyyādetabbo.

37952.meaning_1: should be given; (comm) should be finished; should be concluded
37952.phonetic:
īy > iyy
a > ā
t > d
37952.example_1: tena bhikkhunā pucchitabbā, samagg'āttha, bhaginiyo'ti? sace samagg'āmh'āyyā'ti bhaṇanti, vattanti, bhaginiyo, aṭṭha garudhammā'ti? sace vattant'āyyā'ti bhaṇanti, eso, bhaginiyo, ovādo'ti niyyādetabbo.

19012.meaning_1: should be recited; should be readmitted
19012.meaning_lit: to cause to be flowed down
19012.example_1: sace na vattant'āyyā'ti bhaṇanti, osāretabbā. vassasat'ūpasampannāya bhikkhuniyā tadah'upasampannassa bhikkhuno abhivādanaṃ paccuṭṭhānaṃ añjalikammaṃ sāmīcikammaṃ kātabbaṃ

66557.example_1: vassasat'ūpasampannāya bhikkhuniyā tadah'upasampannassa bhikkhuno abhivādanaṃ paccuṭṭhānaṃ añjalikammaṃ sāmīcikammaṃ kātabbaṃ, ayam'pi dhammo sakkatvā garukatvā mānetvā pūjetvā yāvajīvaṃ anatikkamanīyo.

29802.example_1: vassasat'ūpasampannāya bhikkhuniyā tadah'upasampannassa bhikkhuno abhivādanaṃ paccuṭṭhānaṃ añjalikammaṃ sāmīcikammaṃ kātabbaṃ, ayam'pi dhammo sakkatvā garukatvā mānetvā pūjetvā yāvajīvaṃ anatikkamanīyo.

39495.meaning_1: rising from one's seat as a token of respect; (comm) reverence in general
39495.example_1: cattāro'me, mahārāja, vaṇṇā, khattiyā, brāhmaṇā, vessā, suddā. imesaṃ kho, mahārāja, catunnaṃ vaṇṇānaṃ dve vaṇṇā aggam'akkhāyanti, khattiyā ca brāhmaṇā ca, yadidaṃ abhivādana-paccuṭṭhāna-añjalikamma-sāmīcikammānī'ti.
39495.example_2: vassasat'ūpasampannāya bhikkhuniyā tadah'upasampannassa bhikkhuno abhivādanaṃ paccuṭṭhānaṃ añjalikammaṃ sāmīcikammaṃ kātabbaṃ, ayam'pi dhammo sakkatvā garukatvā mānetvā pūjetvā yāvajīvaṃ anatikkamanīyo.
39495.commentary: (MNa) yasmiṃ vā disābhāge ācariyo vasati, iriyāpathe vā kappento tadabhimukho vanditvā gacchati, vanditvā nisīdati, vanditvā nipajjati, ācariyaṃ pana dūrato'va disvā paccuṭṭhāya paccuggamanakaraṇaṃ paccuṭṭhānaṃ nāma.

1481.meaning_1: respectful salutation; greeting with palms joined together
1481.example_1: cattāro'me, mahārāja, vaṇṇā, khattiyā, brāhmaṇā, vessā, suddā. imesaṃ kho, mahārāja, catunnaṃ vaṇṇānaṃ dve vaṇṇā aggam'akkhāyanti, khattiyā ca brāhmaṇā ca, yadidaṃ abhivādana-paccuṭṭhāna-añjalikamma-sāmīcikammānī'ti.
1481.example_2: vassasat'ūpasampannāya bhikkhuniyā tadah'upasampannassa bhikkhuno abhivādanaṃ paccuṭṭhānaṃ añjalikammaṃ sāmīcikammaṃ kātabbaṃ, ayam'pi dhammo sakkatvā garukatvā mānetvā pūjetvā yāvajīvaṃ anatikkamanīyo.
1481.commentary: (MNa) ācariyaṃ pana disvā añjaliṃ paggayha sīse ṭhapetvā ācariyaṃ namassati, yasmiṃ vā disābhāge so vasati, tadabhimukho'pi tath'eva namassati, gacchanto'pi ṭhito'pi nisinno'pi añjaliṃ paggayha namassati'y'evā'ti idaṃ añjalikammaṃ nāma.

62381.example_1: cattāro'me, mahārāja, vaṇṇā, khattiyā, brāhmaṇā, vessā, suddā. imesaṃ kho, mahārāja, catunnaṃ vaṇṇānaṃ dve vaṇṇā aggam'akkhāyanti, khattiyā ca brāhmaṇā ca, yadidaṃ abhivādana-paccuṭṭhāna-añjalikamma-sāmīcikammānī'ti.
62381.example_2: vassasat'ūpasampannāya bhikkhuniyā tadah'upasampannassa bhikkhuno abhivādanaṃ paccuṭṭhānaṃ añjalikammaṃ sāmīcikammaṃ kātabbaṃ, ayam'pi dhammo sakkatvā garukatvā mānetvā pūjetvā yāvajīvaṃ anatikkamanīyo.

24514.meaning_1: having honoured; having esteemed; having paid respect
24514.example_1: atthi nu kho, bho ānanda, ekabhikkhu'pi yaṃ tumhe eta'r'ahi sakkarotha garukarotha mānetha pūjetha, sakkatvā garukatvā upanissāya viharathā'ti?
24514.example_2: vassasat'ūpasampannāya bhikkhuniyā tadah'upasampannassa bhikkhuno abhivādanaṃ paccuṭṭhānaṃ añjalikammaṃ sāmīcikammaṃ kātabbaṃ, ayam'pi dhammo sakkatvā garukatvā mānetvā pūjetvā yāvajīvaṃ anatikkamanīyo.

52332.meaning_1: having honoured; having revered; having thought highly (of)
52332.meaning_2: having honoured, having revered, having thought highly
52332.example_1: imañ'ca hi te bhonto na sakkareyyuṃ na garuṃ kareyyuṃ na māneyyuṃ na pūjeyyuṃ, atha kiñ'carahi te bhonto sakkareyyuṃ garuṃ kareyyuṃ māneyyuṃ pūjeyyuṃ, sakkatvā garuṃ katvā mānetvā pūjetvā upanissāya vihareyyun'ti?
52332.example_2: vassasat'ūpasampannāya bhikkhuniyā tadah'upasampannassa bhikkhuno abhivādanaṃ paccuṭṭhānaṃ añjalikammaṃ sāmīcikammaṃ kātabbaṃ, ayam'pi dhammo sakkatvā garukatvā mānetvā pūjetvā yāvajīvaṃ anatikkamanīyo.

47180.meaning_1: having revered; having honoured; having respected
47180.example_1: imañ'ca hi te bhonto na sakkareyyuṃ na garuṃ kareyyuṃ na māneyyuṃ na pūjeyyuṃ, atha kiñ'carahi te bhonto sakkareyyuṃ garuṃ kareyyuṃ māneyyuṃ pūjeyyuṃ, sakkatvā garuṃ katvā mānetvā pūjetvā upanissāya vihareyyun'ti?
47180.example_2: vassasat'ūpasampannāya bhikkhuniyā tadah'upasampannassa bhikkhuno abhivādanaṃ paccuṭṭhānaṃ añjalikammaṃ sāmīcikammaṃ kātabbaṃ, ayam'pi dhammo sakkatvā garukatvā mānetvā pūjetvā yāvajīvaṃ anatikkamanīyo.

7583.meaning_1: (of a monastery) without resident monks; not containing monastics
7583.construction:
na > a + √bhikkh + u + ka
abhikkhu + ka
7583.example_1: na bhikkhuniyā abhikkhuke āvāse vassaṃ vasitabbaṃ, ayam'pi dhammo sakkatvā garukatvā mānetvā pūjetvā yāvajīvaṃ anatikkamanīyo.
7583.commentary: (VINa) abhikkhuko āvāso'ti suññavihāro, yattha eko'pi bhikkhu n'atthi, tattha vās'atthāya na gantabbaṃ.

39474.meaning_1: should be expected; should be anticipated
39474.construction: pati > paty > pacc + ā + sīsa + itabba
39474.example_1: anvaddhamāsaṃ bhikkhuniyā bhikkhusaṅghato dve dhammā paccāsīsitabbā uposathapucchakañ'ca ovādupasaṅkamanañ'ca

16517.meaning_2: questioning about the (day of the) uposatha ceremony
16517.example_1: anvaddhamāsaṃ bhikkhuniyā bhikkhusaṅghato dve dhammā paccāsīsitabbā uposathapucchakañ'ca ovādupasaṅkamanañ'ca

19108.meaning_1: approaching for the sake of instruction
19108.example_1: anvaddhamāsaṃ bhikkhuniyā bhikkhusaṅghato dve dhammā paccāsīsitabbā uposathapucchakañ'ca ovādupasaṅkamanañ'ca

44923.meaning_1: (vinaya) to be invited; to be requested (someone, wrt)
44923.meaning_2: (vinaya) to be invited; to be requested
44923.example_1: vassaṃ vuṭṭhāya bhikkhuniyā ubhatosaṅghe tīhi ṭhānehi pavāretabbaṃ diṭṭhena vā sutena vā parisaṅkāya vā, ayam'pi dhammo

39124.example_1: garudhammaṃ ajjhāpannāya bhikkhuniyā ubhatosaṅghe pakkhamānattaṃ caritabbaṃ, ayam'pi dhammo
39124.commentary: (VINa) pakkhamānattaṃ nāma, yaṃ paṭicchannāya vā appaṭicchannāya vā āpattiyā addhamāsaṃ bhikkhunīnaṃ diyyati.

26304.meaning_1: should be practised; should be done
26304.example_1: rājā mahāsudassano evam'āha, pāṇo na hantabbo, adinnaṃ na ādātabbaṃ, kāmesu micchā na caritabbā, musā na bhaṇitabbā, majjaṃ na pātabbaṃ, yathābhuttañ'ca bhuñjathā'ti.
26304.example_2: garudhammaṃ ajjhāpannāya bhikkhuniyā ubhatosaṅghe pakkhamānattaṃ caritabbaṃ, ayam'pi dhammo

346.meaning_1: should be insulted; should be abused
346.meaning_2: should be insulted; should be abused
346.example_1: na hi pana tvaṃ, tāta bhadramukha, tassa bhagavato sīlapaññāṇaṃ jānāsi. sace tvaṃ, tāta bhadramukha, tassa bhagavato sīlapaññāṇaṃ jāneyyāsi, na tvaṃ, tāta bhadramukha, taṃ bhagavantaṃ akkositabbaṃ paribhāsitabbaṃ maññeyyāsī'ti.
346.example_2: na bhikkhuniyā kena ci pariyāyena bhikkhu akkositabbo paribhāsitabbo, ayam'pi dhammo

43801.meaning_1: should be abused; should be insulted; should be reviled; should be badmouthed
43801.example_1: sace tvaṃ, tāta bhadramukha, tassa bhagavato sīlapaññāṇaṃ jāneyyāsi, na tvaṃ, tāta bhadramukha, taṃ bhagavantaṃ akkositabbaṃ paribhāsitabbaṃ maññeyyāsī'ti.
43801.example_2: na bhikkhuniyā kena ci pariyāyena bhikkhu akkositabbo paribhāsitabbo, ayam'pi dhammo

19051.example_1: ajja't'agge ovaṭo bhikkhunīnaṃ bhikkhūsu vacanapatho, anovaṭo bhikkhūnaṃ bhikkhunīsu vacanapatho, ayam'pi dhammo sakkatvā garukatvā mānetvā pūjetvā yāvajīvaṃ anatikkamanīyo'ti.

5629.example_1: ajja't'agge ovaṭo bhikkhunīnaṃ bhikkhūsu vacanapatho, anovaṭo bhikkhūnaṃ bhikkhunīsu vacanapatho, ayam'pi dhammo sakkatvā garukatvā mānetvā pūjetvā yāvajīvaṃ anatikkamanīyo'ti.

4244.construction:
na > a + nī + yāde + tvā
na + niyyādetvā
4244.example_1: sace vaggāmhāyyāti bhaṇantaṃ aṭṭha garudhamme bhaṇati, āpatti dukkaṭassa. ovādaṃ aniyyādetvā aññaṃ dhammaṃ bhaṇati, āpatti dukkaṭassa.

3057.meaning_1: not a legally valid action; not a legitimate vinaya procedure

65534.meaning_1: perceiving (the community) as not all present; regarding (the Saṅgha) as not all together
65534.example_1: te jānanti atth'aññe āvāsikā bhikkhū anāgatā'ti. te dhammasaññino vinayasaññino vaggā vaggasaññino uposathaṃ karonti, pātimokkhaṃ uddisanti.
65534.example_2: adhammakamme adhammakammasaññī vaggaṃ bhikkhunisaṅghaṃ vaggasaññī ovadati, āpatti pācittiyassa.

59138.meaning_1: perceiving the community as in unity
59138.example_1: te na jāniṃsu atth'aññe āvāsikā bhikkhū anāgatā'ti. te dhammasaññino vinayasaññino vaggā samaggasaññino uposathaṃ akaṃsu, pātimokkhaṃ uddisiṃsu. tehi uddissamāne pātimokkhe, ath'aññe āvāsikā bhikkhū āgacchiṃsu bahutarā.
59138.example_2: adhammakamme adhammakammasaññī vaggaṃ bhikkhunisaṅghaṃ samaggasaññī ovadati, āpatti pācittiyassa.
59138.commentary: (VINa) vaggā samaggasaññino'ti tesaṃ sīmaṃ okkantattā vaggā, sīmaṃ okkantabhāvassa ajānanato samaggasaññino.

2627.example_1: atthaṅ'gate atthaṅgatasaññī ovadati, āpatti pācittiyassa. atthaṅ'gate vematiko ovadati, āpatti pācittiyassa. atthaṅ'gate anatthaṅgatasaññī ovadati, āpatti pācittiyassa.

3590.example_1: atthaṅ'gate atthaṅgatasaññī ovadati, āpatti pācittiyassa. atthaṅ'gate vematiko ovadati, āpatti pācittiyassa. atthaṅ'gate anatthaṅgatasaññī ovadati, āpatti pācittiyassa.

3589.grammar: pp of na atthaṃ gacchati, comp
3589.meaning_1: (of the sun) not set; not gone down

9656.construction: na > a + saṃ + vi + daha + ita

9657.meaning_1: perceiving as not arranged; regarding (something) as not organised
9657.example_1: asaṃvidahite vematiko, āpatti dukkaṭassa. asaṃvidahite asaṃvidahitasaññī, anāpatti.

9658.meaning_1: having not arranged; having not organised; having not planned
9658.construction:
na > a + saṃ + vi + daha + itvā
na + saṃvidahitvā
9658.example_1: anāpatti samaye, asaṃvidahitvā gacchati, bhikkhunī saṃvidahati, bhikkhu na saṃvidahati, visaṅketena gacchanti, āpadāsu, ummattakassa, ādikammikassā'ti.

69104.meaning_1: not in line with agreement; not according arrangement
69104.example_1: anāpatti samaye, asaṃvidahitvā gacchati, bhikkhunī saṃvidahati, bhikkhu na saṃvidahati, visaṅketena gacchanti, āpadāsu, ummattakassa, ādikammikassā'ti.

1952.example_1: dhammo, ānanda, pāsādo puratthimena pacchimena ca yojanaṃ āyāmena ahosi. uttarena dakkhiṇena ca aḍḍhayojanaṃ vitthārena.
1952.example_2: kukkuṭasampāte gāme, gām'antare gām'antare āpatti pācittiyassa. agāmake araññe, aḍḍhayojane aḍḍhayojane āpatti pācittiyassa.

6369.meaning_1: not organized; not arranged; not brought to fruition (by)
6369.example_1: aparipācite paripācitasaññī, āpatti dukkaṭassa. aparipācitte vematiko, āpatti dukkaṭassa. aparipācite aparipācitasaññī, anāpatti.

6370.meaning_1: perceiving as not organized; regarding (something) as not arranged
6370.example_1: aparipācite paripācitasaññī, āpatti dukkaṭassa. aparipācitte vematiko, āpatti dukkaṭassa. aparipācite aparipācitasaññī, anāpatti.

43641.example_1: aparipācite paripācitasaññī, āpatti dukkaṭassa. aparipācitte vematiko, āpatti dukkaṭassa. aparipācite aparipācitasaññī, anāpatti.

1597.meaning_1: engaged with something else; preoccupied with something else
1597.meaning_2: being occupied with something else, distracted
1597.example_1: anāpatti yo koci viññū dutiyo hoti, tiṭṭhati na nisīdati, araho'pekkho, aññavihito nisīdati, ummattakassa, ādikammikassā'ti.

69720.example_1: anāpatti yo koci viññū dutiyo hoti, tiṭṭhati na nisīdati, araho'pekkho, aññavihito nisīdati, ummattakassa, ādikammikassā'ti.

551.example_1: agilāno agilānasaññī tat'uttari āvasathapiṇḍaṃ bhuñjati, āpatti pācittiyassa. agilāno vematiko tat'uttari āvasathapiṇḍaṃ bhuñjati, āpatti pācittiyassa.

24973.example_1: agilāno vematiko tat'uttari āvasathapiṇḍaṃ bhuñjati, āpatti pācittiyassa. agilāno gilānasaññī tat'uttariṃ āvasathapiṇḍaṃ bhuñjati, āpatti pācittiyassa.
24973.commentary: (KVt) gilānassa gilānasaññino'ti gilānassa pana gilāno ahan'ti saññino anuvasitvā bhuñjantassa anāpatti.

37751.meaning_1: having invited; having made an offer
37751.example_1: nibaddhaṃ mama gehaṃ pavisatha, aham'eva catūhi paccayehi upaṭṭhahissāmī'ti theraṃ nimantetvā pakkāmi.
37751.example_2: anāpatti gilānassa, agilāno sakiṃ bhuñjati, gacchanto, vā āgacchanto vā bhuñjati, sāmikā nimantetvā bhojenti, odissa paññatto hoti, na yāva'd'attho paññatto hoti, pañca bhojanāni ṭhapetvā sabbattha anāpatti, ummattakassa, ādikammikassā'ti.

50405.example_1: bhikkhū pana mayaṃ, bhante, ājānīy'eva samāne ājānīyā'ti jānissāma ājānīy'eva samāne ājānīyabhojanaṃ bhojessāma, ājānīy'eva samāne ājānīyaṭhāne ṭhapessāma.
50405.example_2: anāpatti gilānassa, agilāno sakiṃ bhuñjati, gacchanto, vā āgacchanto vā bhuñjati, sāmikā nimantetvā bhojenti, odissa paññatto hoti, na yāva'd'attho paññatto hoti, pañca bhojanāni ṭhapetvā sabbattha anāpatti, ummattakassa, ādikammikassā'ti.

18637.example_1: anāpatti gilānassa, agilāno sakiṃ bhuñjati, gacchanto, vā āgacchanto vā bhuñjati, sāmikā nimantetvā bhojenti, odissa paññatto hoti, na yāva'd'attho paññatto hoti, pañca bhojanāni ṭhapetvā sabbattha anāpatti, ummattakassa, ādikammikassā'ti.

35402.meaning_1: not a group meal; not eating in a group
35402.example_1: nagaṇabhojane gaṇabhojanasaññī, āpatti dukkaṭassa. nagaṇabhojane vematiko, āpatti dukkaṭassa. nagaṇabhojane nagaṇabhojanasaññī, anāpatti.

24095.meaning_1: perceiving (something) as eating in a group
24095.example_1: nagaṇabhojane gaṇabhojanasaññī, āpatti dukkaṭassa. nagaṇabhojane vematiko, āpatti dukkaṭassa. nagaṇabhojane nagaṇabhojanasaññī, anāpatti.

35403.meaning_1: perceiving (something) as not eating in a group
35403.example_1: nagaṇabhojane gaṇabhojanasaññī, āpatti dukkaṭassa. nagaṇabhojane vematiko, āpatti dukkaṭassa. nagaṇabhojane nagaṇabhojanasaññī, anāpatti.

36987.example_1: anāpatti samaye, dve tayo ekato bhuñjanti, piṇḍāya caritvā ekato sannipatitvā bhuñjanti, niccabhattaṃ, salākabhattaṃ, pakkhikaṃ, uposathikaṃ, pāṭipadikaṃ, pañca bhojanāni ṭhapetvā sabbattha anāpatti, ummattakassa, ādikammikassā'ti.
36987.commentary: (VSa) niccabhattan'ti dhuvabhattaṃ vuccati, niccabhattaṃ gaṇhathā'ti vadanti, bahūnaṃ ekato gahetuṃ vaṭṭati.

61142.example_1: anāpatti samaye, dve tayo ekato bhuñjanti, piṇḍāya caritvā ekato sannipatitvā bhuñjanti, niccabhattaṃ, salākabhattaṃ, pakkhikaṃ, uposathikaṃ, pāṭipadikaṃ, pañca bhojanāni ṭhapetvā sabbattha anāpatti, ummattakassa, ādikammikassā'ti.

39142.example_1: anāpatti samaye, dve tayo ekato bhuñjanti, piṇḍāya caritvā ekato sannipatitvā bhuñjanti, niccabhattaṃ, salākabhattaṃ, pakkhikaṃ, uposathikaṃ, pāṭipadikaṃ, pañca bhojanāni ṭhapetvā sabbattha anāpatti, ummattakassa, ādikammikassā'ti.

45321.meaning_1: (meal offered) on the day following the observance day
45321.example_1: anāpatti samaye, dve tayo ekato bhuñjanti, piṇḍāya caritvā ekato sannipatitvā bhuñjanti, niccabhattaṃ, salākabhattaṃ, pakkhikaṃ, uposathikaṃ, pāṭipadikaṃ, pañca bhojanāni ṭhapetvā sabbattha anāpatti, ummattakassa, ādikammikassā'ti.

39634.meaning_1: monk who walks behind; accompanying monk
39634.meaning_2: junior monk who walks behind a senior on his rounds
39634.example_1: atha kho, pāpima, kakusandho bhagavā arahaṃ sammāsambuddho pubb'aṇhasamayaṃ nivāsetvā pattacīvaram'ādāya āyasmatā vidhurena pacchāsamaṇena gāmaṃ piṇḍāya pāvisi.
39634.example_2: atha kho bhagavā pubb'aṇhasamayaṃ nivāsetvā pattacīvaram'ādāya āyasmatā ānandena pacchāsamaṇena yena aññataraṃ kulaṃ ten'upasaṅkami, upasaṅkamitvā paññatte āsane nisīdi.

49297.example_1: aññataro bhikkhu piṇḍapātaṃ ādāya yena so bhikkhu ten'upasaṅkami, upasaṅkamitvā taṃ bhikkhuṃ etadavoca, bhuñjāhi, āvuso'ti. alaṃ, āvuso, atthi me bhattapaccāsā'ti. tassa bhikkhuno piṇḍapāto ussūre āharīyittha.

35692.meaning_1: not a meal in succession; not eating one meal before the other
35692.example_1: naparamparabhojane paramparabhojanasaññī, āpatti dukkaṭassa. naparamparabhojane vematiko, āpatti dukkaṭassa. naparamparabhojane naparamparabhojanasaññī, anāpatti.

43013.meaning_1: perceiving (something) as eating one meal after the other
43013.example_1: naparamparabhojane paramparabhojanasaññī, āpatti dukkaṭassa. naparamparabhojane vematiko, āpatti dukkaṭassa. naparamparabhojane naparamparabhojanasaññī, anāpatti.

35693.meaning_1: perceiving (oneself) as not eating one meal after the other
35693.example_1: naparamparabhojane paramparabhojanasaññī, āpatti dukkaṭassa. naparamparabhojane vematiko, āpatti dukkaṭassa. naparamparabhojane naparamparabhojanasaññī, anāpatti.

37740.example_1: seyyath'idaṃ, nando vaccho, kiso saṃkicco, makkhali gosālo, etehi, bho gotama, acelakā mutt'ācārā hatth'āpalekhanā naehibhaddantikā natiṭṭhabhaddantikā na abhihaṭaṃ na uddissakataṃ na nimantanaṃ sādiyanti
37740.example_2: anāpatti samaye, vikappetvā bhuñjati, dve tayo nimantane ekato bhuñjati, nimantanapaṭipāṭiyā bhuñjati, sakalena gāmena nimantito tasmiṃ gāme yattha katthaci bhuñjati, sakalena pūgena nimantito tasmiṃ pūge yattha katthaci bhuñjati
37740.commentary: (DNa) na nimantanan'ti asukaṃ nāma kulaṃ vā vīthiṃ vā gāmaṃ vā paviseyyāthā'ti evaṃ nimantitabhikkham'pi na sādiyati, na gaṇhāti.

37742.example_1: anāpatti samaye, vikappetvā bhuñjati, dve tayo nimantane ekato bhuñjati, nimantanapaṭipāṭiyā bhuñjati, sakalena gāmena nimantito tasmiṃ gāme yattha katthaci bhuñjati, sakalena pūgena nimantito tasmiṃ pūge yattha katthaci bhuñjati

37748.example_1: santi kho pana me, udāyi, sāvakā piṇḍapātikā sapadānacārino uñch'āsake vate ratā, te antaragharaṃ paviṭṭhā samānā āsanena'pi nimantiyamānā na sādiyanti.
37748.example_2: nimantiyamāno bhikkhaṃ gahessāmī'ti bhaṇati, niccabhatte, salākabhatte, pakkhike, uposathike, pāṭipadike, pañca bhojanāni ṭhapetvā sabbattha anāpatti, ummattakassa, ādikammikassā'ti.

40749.example_1: paheṇak'atthāya vā pātheyy'atthāya vā paṭiyattasesakaṃ denti, gamane paṭippassaddhe denti, ñātakānaṃ pavāritānaṃ, aññass'atthāya, attano dhanena, ummattakassa, ādikammikassā'ti.

9180.example_1: anatirittaṃ nāma akappiyakataṃ hoti, appaṭiggahitakataṃ hoti, anuccāritakataṃ hoti, ahatthapāse kataṃ hoti, abhuttāvinā kataṃ hoti, bhuttāvinā pavāritena āsanā vuṭṭhitena kataṃ hoti, alam'etaṃ sabban'ti avuttaṃ hoti, na gilān'ātirittaṃ hoti, etaṃ anatirittaṃ nāma.

3541.example_1: ajjhohāre ajjhohāre āpatti dukkaṭassa. atiritte anatirittasaññī, āpatti dukkaṭassa. atiritte vematiko, āpatti dukkaṭassa.

2272.example_1: anatiritte vematiko khādanīyaṃ vā bhojanīyaṃ vā khādati vā bhuñjati vā, āpatti pācittiyassa. anatiritte atirittasaññī khādanīyaṃ vā bhojanīyaṃ vā khādati vā bhuñjati vā, āpatti pācittiyassa.

13233.meaning_1: for food; for the purpose of eating
13233.example_1: yāmakālikaṃ satt'āhakālikaṃ yāvajīvikaṃ āhāratthāya paṭiggaṇhāti, āpatti dukkaṭassa. ajjhohāre ajjhohāre āpatti dukkaṭassa.

44921.example_1: appavārite pavāritasaññī, āpatti dukkaṭassa. appavārite vematiko, āpatti dukkaṭassa. appavārite appavāritasaññī, anāpatti.

7058.example_1: appavārite pavāritasaññī, āpatti dukkaṭassa. appavārite vematiko, āpatti dukkaṭassa. appavārite appavāritasaññī, anāpatti.

67167.meaning_1: perceiving (something) as the wrong time; regarding it as after midday
67167.example_1: vikāle vikālasaññī khādanīyaṃ vā bhojanīyaṃ vā khādati vā bhuñjati vā, āpatti pācittiyassa. vikāle vematiko khādanīyaṃ vā bhojanīyaṃ vā khādati vā bhuñjati vā, āpatti pācittiyassa.

21444.meaning_1: perceiving (something) as the right time; regarding it as before midday
21444.example_1: vikāle vematiko khādanīyaṃ vā bhojanīyaṃ vā khādati vā bhuñjati vā, āpatti pācittiyassa. vikāle kālasaññī khādanīyaṃ vā bhojanīyaṃ vā khādati vā bhuñjati vā, āpatti pācittiyassa.

6811.meaning_1: perceiving as not formally accepted; regarding (something) as not received
6811.example_1: appaṭiggahitake appaṭiggahitakasaññī adinnaṃ mukhadvāraṃ āhāraṃ āhāreti, aññatra udakadantaponā, āpatti pācittiyassa.

40330.meaning_1: perceiving as formally accepted; regarding (something) as received
40330.example_1: paṭiggahitake vematiko, āpatti dukkaṭassa. paṭiggahitake paṭiggahitakasaññī, anāpatti.

40328.meaning_1: (vinaya) formally accepted; received by a monastic

52023.example_1: anāpatti udakadantapone, cattāri mahāvikatāni sati paccaye asati kappiyakārake sāmaṃ gahetvā paribhuñjati, ummattakassa, ādikammikassā'ti.
52023.commentary: (VMVt) apakatibhesajjattā vikaṭāni virūpāni visaharaṇato mahāvisayattā mahantāni cā'ti mahāvikaṭāni. (KVt) cattāri mahāvikaṭānī'ti gūthaṃ, muttaṃ, chārikā, mattikā ca āsayādi-vasena virūpāni jātānī'ti katvā vikaṭānī'ti vā apakatibhojanattā vikaṭāni virūpāni jātānī'ti vā attho.
